csw.services.pkg

Interface LifecycleHandler


  • public interface LifecycleHandler
    Containers and Components can override these to handle lifecycle changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LifecycleHandler.Failure 
      static class  LifecycleHandler.Failure$ 
      static interface  LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse
      Return type of LifecycleHandler methods that component actors can implement
      static class  LifecycleHandler.Success$ 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String componentName() 
      LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse initialize()
      Components can override this method to run code when initializing.
      void lifecycleFailure(LifecycleManager.LifecycleState lifecycleState, java.lang.String reason)
      Components can override this method to run code when a lifecycle failure has occurred.
      scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> lifecycleHandlerReceive()
      This implements additional behavior (used in receive method of ccs controller actors)
      LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse shutdown()
      Components can override this method to run code when shutting down.
      LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse startup()
      Components can override this method to run code when starting up.
      LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse uninitialize()
      Components can override this method to run code when uninitializing.

      • initialize

        LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse initialize()
        Components can override this method to run code when initializing.

        Returns:
        either the new lifecycle state, or the lifecycle error

      • startup

        LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse startup()
        Components can override this method to run code when starting up.

        Returns:
        either the new lifecycle state, or the lifecycle error

      • shutdown

        LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse shutdown()
        Components can override this method to run code when shutting down.

        Returns:
        either the new lifecycle state, or the lifecycle error

      • uninitialize

        LifecycleHandler.HandlerResponse uninitialize()
        Components can override this method to run code when uninitializing.

        Returns:
        either the new lifecycle state, or the lifecycle error

      • lifecycleFailure

        void lifecycleFailure(LifecycleManager.LifecycleState lifecycleState,
                      java.lang.String reason)
        Components can override this method to run code when a lifecycle failure has occurred.
